member.summary: Renders (draws) the object to the Graphics object.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.Rendering.Renderer.Format(MigraDoc.Rendering.Area,MigraDoc.Rendering.FormatInfo)
member.summary: Formats the object by calculating distances and linebreaks and stopping when the area is filled.
member.param: The area to render into.
An information object received from a previous call of Format(). Null for the first call.

member.summary: Creates a fitting renderer for the given document object for formatting.
member.param: The XGraphics object to do measurements on.
The document renderer.
the document object to format.
The field infos.
member.returns: The fitting Renderer.

member.summary: Creates a fitting renderer for the render info to render and layout with.
member.param: The XGraphics object to render on.
The document renderer.
The RenderInfo object stored after a previous call of Format().
The field infos.
member.returns: The fitting Renderer.

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.Renderer.MaxElementHeight
member.summary: Determines the maximum height a single element may have.

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.Renderer.InitialLayoutInfo
member.summary: In inherited classes, gets a layout info with only margin and break information set. It can be taken before the documen object is formatted.
member.remarks: In inherited classes, the following parts are set properly: MarginTop, MarginLeft, MarginRight, MarginBottom, KeepTogether, KeepWithNext, PagebreakBefore, Floating, VerticalReference, HorizontalReference.

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.Renderer.RenderInfo
member.summary: Gets the render information necessary to render and position the object.

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.Renderer.FieldInfos
member.summary: Sets the field infos object.
member.remarks: This property is set by the AreaProvider.

member.summary: Sets the zoom factor so that the whole document fits completely into the window.

member.summary: Iterates sequentially through the elements of a paragraph.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.Rendering.ParagraphIterator.#ctor(MigraDoc.DocumentObjectModel.ParagraphElements)
member.summary: Initializes a paragraph iterator pointing on the given paragraph elements object. Paragraph iterators received from this paragraph iterator relate to this root node.
member.param: The root node for the paragraph iterator.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.Rendering.ParagraphIterator.#ctor(MigraDoc.DocumentObjectModel.ParagraphElements,MigraDoc.DocumentObjectModel.DocumentObject,System.Collections.ArrayList)
member.summary: Initializes a paragraph iterator given the root node, its position in the object tree and the current object
member.param: The node the position indices relate to.
The element the iterator shall point to.
The position of the paragraph iterator in terms of element indices.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.Rendering.ParagraphIterator.GetLastLeaf
member.summary: Gets the last leaf of the document object tree.
member.returns: The paragraph iterator pointing to the last leaf in the document object tree.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.Rendering.ParagraphIterator.GetFirstLeaf
member.summary: Gets the first leaf of the element tree.
member.returns: The paragraph iterator pointing to the first leaf in the element tree.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.Rendering.ParagraphIterator.GetNextLeaf
member.summary: Returns the next iterator in the tree pointing to a leaf.
member.remarks: This function is intended to receive the renderable objects of a paragraph. Thus, empty ParagraphElement objects (which are collections) don't count as leafs.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.Rendering.ParagraphIterator.GetNodeObject(MigraDoc.DocumentObjectModel.DocumentObject)
member.summary: Gets the object a paragraph iterator shall point to. Only ParagraphElements and renderable objects are allowed.
member.param: The object to select the node object for.
member.returns: The object a paragraph iterator shall point to.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.Rendering.ParagraphIterator.GetPreviousLeaf
member.summary: Returns the previous iterator to a leaf in the document object tree pointing.
member.returns: The previous leaf, null if none exists.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.Rendering.ParagraphIterator.SeekFirstLeaf
member.summary: Gets the leftmost leaf within the hierarchy.
member.returns: The searched leaf.

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.ParagraphIterator.IsFirstLeaf
member.summary: Determines whether this iterator is the first leaf of the root node.

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.ParagraphIterator.IsLastLeaf
member.summary: Determines whether this iterator is the last leaf of the document object tree.

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.ParagraphIterator.Current
member.summary: Gets the document object this instance ponits to.

member.name: F:MigraDoc.Rendering.DocumentRenderer.PrepareDocumentProgressEventArgs.Value
member.summary: Indicates the current step reached in document preparation.

member.name: F:MigraDoc.Rendering.DocumentRenderer.PrepareDocumentProgressEventArgs.Maximum
member.summary: Indicates the final step in document preparation. The quitient of Value and Maximum can be used to calculate a percentage (e. g. for use in a progress bar).

member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.summary: Goes to the first page.

member.summary: Goes to the next page.

member.summary: Goes to the previous page.

member.summary: Goes to the last page.

member.summary: Called when the Ddl property has changed.

member.summary: Makes zoom factor larger.

member.summary: Raises the ZoomChanged event when the zoom factor changed.

member.summary: Gets or sets the private fonts of the document. If used, must be set before Ddl is set!

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.Forms.DocumentPreview.Ddl
member.summary: Gets or sets a ddl string or file.

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.Forms.DocumentPreview.Page
member.summary: Gets or sets the current page.

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.Forms.DocumentPreview.PageCount
member.summary: Gets the number of pages.

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.Forms.DocumentPreview.Document
member.summary: Gets or sets the MigraDoc document that is previewed in this control.

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.Forms.DocumentPreview.Renderer
member.summary: Gets the underlying DocumentRenderer of the document currently in preview, or null, if no rederer exists. You can use this renderer for printing or creating PDF file. This evades the necessity to format the document a second time when you want to print it and convert it into PDF.

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.Forms.DocumentPreview.Zoom
member.summary: Gets or sets a predefined zoom factor.

member.name: P:MigraDoc.Rendering.Forms.DocumentPreview.ZoomPercent
member.summary: Gets or sets an arbitrary zoom factor. The range is from 10 to 800.

member.name: E:MigraDoc.Rendering.Forms.DocumentPreview.ZoomChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the zoom factor changed.

member.name: E:MigraDoc.Rendering.Forms.DocumentPreview.PageChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the current page changed.
